```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
setwd("/isdata/sandelin/projects/INFLAMMATION_TRANSFER/data/metadata")

library(tidyverse)
```

# Reading in the metadata file

```{r}
metadata <- read.csv2("sample_metadata_table.csv")

head(metadata)

View(metadata)
```

# Weightloss between instillation and death depending on treatment

```{r}
metadata %>%
ggplot(aes(x="Weight_instillation",y="Weight_death"/"Weight_instillation",col="Particle"))+
  theme_bw()+geom_point()+
  ggtitle("weightloss depends on particle exposure")
```
#No of animals having received LPS
```{r}
metadata %>%
str_count("Particle",LPS)
```
